title: Looking for a casual team to just learn and improve not serious
body: Im a bronze 5 only started playing earlier this year and Im just looking to get some consistent games with a team up, I am don't main with a role yet and will be happy to learn a role if necessary or just a team where we change lanes and just have some fun

replies.body: i have a stack of mates i play with anywhere from low bronze to low platinum if you want to get some games in, get some feedback in what you can do do to improve, mostly we just play to have fun, if your interested add me in game nightang3l (3L)
If you can't find anyone, I reckon just find a champion you like and keep playing that champion in its respectful lane
